language.name: Tarifit
language.maps: Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia and Western Sahara

translations.name: Rif-Berber Old Testament (Latin)
translations.description: The Old Testament in the Tarifit (Rif-Berber) language of Morocco. The publishing of the Old Testament in 2014 marks the date of the first completed Bible in a Berber language.

translations.name: Tira Iqeddsen Řɛahd d Aqdim (Ttawrat, Zzabur d Inabiyyen)
translations.description: The Old Testament in the Tarifit (Rif-Berber) language of Morocco. The publishing of the Old Testament in 2014 marks the date of the first completed Bible in a Berber language.
